body.p: Native of Kentucky. Edward Ludwick lived and worked as a farmer in Mercer County. During the Civil War, he enlisted in Company B of the Kentucky 19th Infantry Regiment on 02 Jan 1862. Mustered out on 09 Aug 1862 at Cumberland Gap, TN.

Spouse: Sallie Ludwick
Children: George C. Ludwick, William K Ludwick, Elizabeth F. Ludwick, Doe M. Ludwick, James L. Ludwick, Lemuel L Ludwick, John W Ludwick, Edwin B. Ludwick
